task.summary: Initial Commit - State before modifying RegionManager
Infinite loading - singlethreaded & slow, broken due to getChunk overload
Removed / commented a bunch of old code, Moved a few classes to engine/helpers/, Created EncodedBlockChunk and BlockChunk

Zeus 0.0.2 - Working generation with lerping, chunk gen times at 0.01ms
Optimized data transfer between server and client Server sends adjacent data for chunks now Cleaned up redundant transforms between blockChunk and EncodedBlockChunk Mesh gen now takes ~0.01ms, meaning it can be synchronous Added MapGen class on server, moved mapgen code there Added bilinear interpolation to MapGen methods

Zeus 0.0.3 - block model api, texture atlas
- Added Block atlas and block definitions - Added block model class, made meshchunkbuilder use block models - Added BM_CubeTexFour for blocks that have top, side, and bottom textures - Added BM_CubeTexLifted for grasslike blocks that have poked out sides - Added BM_CubeTexOne for blocks with one texture - Added BM_Plantlike for cross-like plants - Update fragment shader to use more generic lighting

Zeus 0.0.4 - Texture atlas, Entity framework, Player movement, Blockdef solid property
- Added textures to repository, pulled from Aurailus' base_redo texture pack for minetest - Added Texture Atlas object which stitches images together and stores their uvs - Added generic entity framework with code for storing position and velocity and methods to move while respecting collision - Added player movement using entity framework with gravity and collision (F) key to toggle - Added 'solid' property to blockDef api for the entities - Added cap for how many meshes can be built in a frame, seems to not be functioning properly as it can still cause lag

Zeus 0.0.5 - Rendering performance improvements
Interleaved buffers in chunkmesh Only bind texture once on chunk render
Zeus 0.0.52 - Merge Repositories, Server has really tall trunks.
Zeus 0.0.54 - Merge helpers folder, conform directory names to camelcase

Zeus 0.0.55 - Server World Class, better calculate sides function
- Server has a world class, containing chunks and MapGen - GenerateSides now references world class - Changed "sidesOpaque" property in client chunks to "sides"

Zeus 0.0.56 - ChunkLoader class, Server sent chunk updates
- Packetdata is a helper class now, shared between projects, added PLAYER_POSITION enum to it - Renamed chunkatlas to world - Chunkloader class to seperate logic methods from grunt work with world class - ClientThread now has chunk position variable - Client sends position every 30 frames for chunk updates

Zeus 0.0.6 - Cascading Chunk Rendering!
- Range variable in ClientThread - Cascading chunk rendering! - Removed adjacentOpaque info from BlockChunk and EncodedBlockChunk - Chunks render using adjacent array, can be null

Zeus 0.0.7 - Mesh handling changes, Chunk Generation Jobs
- Pad Function in Utils - MeshInfo POJO for ChunkMeshBuilder - MeshMod Enum for runtime modifications - MeshPart now has MeshInfo - Plantlike now uses MeshMod.SHIFT - Removed REQUEST_CHUNK packetType - Commented deprecated requestChunk functions in ConnMan - Debug text in Client World class - Rewrote MapGen class, better trees (unfinished) - Moved map gen to Server World Class - GenChunkTask class for async generation - GenJob class for storing returning data - Server world class is more optimized and can generate faster
